Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes the village of Clayton to offer an optional twenty year retirement plan to a certain police officer employed by such village
Summary: Authorizes the village of Clayton to offer an optional twenty year retirement plan to Joshua David, a police officer employed by such village.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the village of Clayton to offer an optional twenty year retirement plan to a certain police officer employed by such village
